text:
Yesterday I reported IE 6.0.28 bug.
When someone ask you if he or she shoud transfer his or her web application on 
another web server they doesn't always mean that as a threat of leaving Tomcat 
as web server, maybe it is a opinion request from you that I'm asking. And no 
one is giving you any f...... chek for that.
The comment was not for Jakarta or Tomcat but Microsoft IE6.

Let me short this story:
Only jerks have jerken thaughts.
creator: kbicanic@ekonerg.hr
remm@apache.org
text:
Go read the instructions there: http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/bugreport.html
It is very obvious that the place to discuss your problem is tomcat-user, not
Bugzilla.

Please don't use BZ to post opinion pieces (you can post to the mailing lists
for that if you really feel like it, but I recommend you abstain).

Oh, come on.  The least you can do is to go to the trouble of marking this 
as 'duplicate'.

Reopening to change status.
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 23613 ***
